scripts.build:js: tsup src/index.ts --format esm --out-dir dist/js --clean --external alga:extension/secrets --external alga:extension/http --external alga:extension/logging
scripts.build:component: jco componentize dist/js/index.js --wit ./wit/extension-runner.wit --world-name runner --disable all --out dist/component.wasm
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:js && npm run build:component
